name: Math IQ test
description:
Hello my friends! I recently published my new game Math IQ test. As a big fan of math and puzzle games I very want to create beautiful game which will contain all these. To do this I need your help. The game is able in Beta, so I want you to play my game and send me your opinions. Thank you in advance!

Some information about my game:

Join the cool world of numbers! Here you will be able to find out your IQ, improve it and show your computing skills to your friends. Increase your rating, set new records and solve problems in different modes.

HOW TO PLAY

In each game you will have 60 seconds. During this time you have to solve as many problems as possible. For each correctly solved problem you will get points and bonus time, and for incorrectly solved - you will lose 3 seconds. You need to constantly improve your rating to unlock new game modes.

CHARACTERISTIC

- Convenient interface

- Unusual design

- Multiple game modes

- Support records

- We listen to your wishes

- Introduction of improvements according to the wishes of players

Successful problem solving and good mood!
